Articles.Content:
Anyone got this work with KSP 0.22 ? Even with hotfix only thing possible is disable of all mods and my taglist is empty.

The hotfix works for me.
I works like it should for me!

Tried hotfix.

It's autotag generated tags do not show all parts they should show. A lot of part is missing.
I'm assuming you are in career mode and have not yet unlocked the full tech tree. Remember that this plugin will not show parts that you couldn't otherwise see on the parts screen already.

The hotfix works for me.

May bad - hotfix works well - I downloaded it but forgot to install.

I'm assuming you are in career mode and have not yet unlocked the full tech tree. Remember that this plugin will not show parts that you couldn't otherwise see on the parts screen already.

Wrong assumption

I've tested it in sandbox mode.

Specificaly I tested it on Bobcat addons: Soviet Pack and American Pack.

OK then, two more questions:

1) Are the parts visible in sandbox without this plugin installed?

2) If you installed it (and the parts packs) properly, why are you experiencing an issue that others apparently do not? There's no reason why it would work differently for some if everyone installed it correctly, is there?

OK then, two more questions:

1) Are the parts visible in sandbox without this plugin installed?

2) If you installed it (and the parts packs) properly, why are you experiencing an issue that others apparently do not? There's no reason why it would work differently for some if everyone installed it correctly, is there?

1) Yes, they are visible. They are visible even with plugin when I turn filtering off.

2) I wish to know why I'am experiencing an issue, beacause this knowlodge would enable me to fix it up

Well, if I have spare time I will try to build and debug plugin on my own.

1) Yes, they are visible. They are visible even with plugin when I turn filtering off.

2) I wish to know why I'am experiencing an issue, beacause this knowlodge would enable me to fix it up

Well, if I have spare time I will try to build and debug plugin on my own.

I have the same problem with both the Soviet pack and American pack.

EDIT: Also found that there are parts missing from the Random Parts Mod and the RollKage Mod. That is, some parts are not showing up in the catalogue when unlocked or in SandBox mode.

Edited November 7, 2013 by scottholio

I have the same problem with both the Soviet pack and American pack.

EDIT: Also found that there are parts missing from the Random Parts Mod and the RollKage Mod. That is, some parts are not showing up in the catalogue when unlocked or in SandBox mode.

Do you have a clue what the difference between parts shown and omitted?

Do you have a clue what the difference between parts shown and omitted?

I can't see any difference. Take the RollKage mod for example. All parts show up both in the SandBox and Career modes, but with the filter on only the roll cages show up, none of the wheels. I can't see any difference in the cfg files that that would cause this.

Tried hotfix.

It's autotag generated tags do not show all parts they should show. A lot of part is missing.

This also happens to me... autotag does not include some parts from some mods...

Always the same parts doesn't appear... some from AIES, one from mechjeb, a couple from ISS, some from ionelecpack, etc...

I just add them manually... it's pretty easy... it's just tedious cause you have to go tag by tag...

For everyone who's lost without the catalog, here's a hotfix to make it work under 0.22.

I'm currently incorperating some bigger bugfixes regarding losing the catalog, as well as implementing some new features.

Can you put the link in first post of thread?

By the way, there is small issue, when i click on menus added to mod and some part of ship under maneu - it gets clicked too.

Edited December 7, 2013 by kiwiak
I also had the bug with not all parts being catalouged, however it only happened to the American Pack by bobcat for me - all others were fine. This is possibly the most useful mod there is for KSP.

SO thats this bug with not showing all the parts again..

Well it blocks ALL KSP interstellar parts. They dont show even in "all" section.

Unfortunetly this disqualifies this mod for me.. And it was so usefull!

I really hope author will fix it soon.

...

Well it blocks ALL KSP interstellar parts. They dont show even in "all" section.

...

KSP Interstellar parts do work for me (have Interstellar ver. 8.2), just out of the box with this mod (no tagging required): they appear within the tab "WarpPlugin" as that is the folder where those parts are installed, and with the "all" section.

Here it shows: https://www.dropbox.com/s/k5jzqk7m3bpkxo9/VAB-PartCatalog-Interstellar.png

The issue in your case could be KSP had a glitch and didn't load Interstellar? Maybe other mods interference?

I have the issue where half of the letters are missing for menus, part descriptions, everything! Tried both just the original and with hotfix, advice?

NVM It helps if you install BOTH the hotfix and the original files...oh well. Great mod, I LOVE IT!

Edited December 8, 2013 by Taki117
I fixed it
I think I read somewhere that the missing letters are related to minimizing the game when you start it, try opening different windows with Alt+tab and see if it works
Has anyone found that the SubAssemblies button is disappearing? Ever since I installed the Part Catalog with the Hotfix I can't access SubAssemblies (you can use them in Sandbox right?)

Has anyone found that the SubAssemblies button is disappearing? Ever since I installed the Part Catalog with the Hotfix I can't access SubAssemblies (you can use them in Sandbox right?)

It seems to toggle on and off for me if you select the "A" group (upsidedown A) which shows "all" of the available parts.

Hi everyone, for my first post on the KSP Forum I made some additional icons for some popular mods, find them here:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/slmb897dg7w0xtc/partcatalog_redde_icons.zip

I couldn't find the addon development thread for this mod so I'm posting these here.

The zip includes icons for:

- Stretchy Tanks

- RealChutes (or other chutes parts)

- Kerbal Engineer

- RemoteTech (or other Antenna parts)

- Procedural Wings (or other wings parts)

- FusTek parts

- AIES Aerospace Parts

- Nova Punch parts

- Procedural Fairings (or other fairing parts)

you can add these icons to your catalog through the settings menu.

Enjoy!

EDIT:

I Just decided to finish the collection of my currently used mods and added icons to the ZIP for the following stuff:

- KOSMOS Parts

- Realism Overhaul rescaled parts

- Deadly Reentry parts

- Life Support parts (generic icon)

Here's a screenshot:

Edited December 12, 2013 by redde
Added Some more icons AND Added a screenshot
Thank you redde! Beautiful
@ redde: Great. I had the same idea, but no time to make new icons. Thanks for sharing.

Is there one for Kethane some where?
